transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan ji sir.

Executive: Haan sir call aa gaya tha isi karan sir jo hai cut ho gaya tha.

Customer: Haan ji. Isi tarah sir jahan jahan ka hoga jaise Bihar ka hoga to Bihar ka dekh aati dekhhenge agar all over India ka hoga to all over India ka dekhhenge.

Executive: Ji ji ji usme aapko na filter usme aapko upar filter ka option aayega location man lo ki aapko sirf Bihar ki lead chahiye.

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Parits me aap jaoge to aapko upar filter ka location bhi aayega jisme location aap laga sakte ho, thik hai?

Customer: Achha location ka hai to yahan pe.

Executive: Parits me aap dekhoge upar hi location ka option aata hai aap location aap laga sakte ho aur aapki jo services hai wo MDC naam hai uska mini dynamic catalog naam hai usme aapko ek daily aur 10 weekly byit ka balance milta hai matlab yani aap total pure week me aap 17 logo se connect kar paoge.

Customer: Achha.

Executive: Ji ek byit ka balance aapko daily milta hai aur 10 weekly milta hai daily wala aapko daily expire ho jayega raat ke 11:59 me aur agle din 12:01 baje aa jayega.

Customer: Achha.

Executive: Thik hai agar aap use kar consume karte hain byit to agar wo thik baat hai agar nahi bhi karte hain to expire hona hi hai wo.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Thik hai to aap thik hai to aap daily basis pe ek bar consumption rakhiye aur jo bhi inquiries calls aati hai inquiries aati hai to usko inquiries ko aapko lead manager check karte rehna hai aapko jo bhi customer aapko respond ye record bhej raha hai koi profile pe aake direct aake ki aapki mujhe rate achchi lagi hai profile pe to mujhe aapse deal karna hai to usko respond karna hai aur jo bhi calls aati hai sabko calls ko aapko respond karna hai thik hai miss nahi karna hai.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Ye business opportunities hai jo aapko miss nahi karni hai jitne bhi aapne investment kiya hai aapko achcha khasa India mart business mil jayega.

Customer: Achcha.

Executive: Aur sab kuch aap try karega whatsapp pe bhi connect karne ka kyuki har kisi har buyer ke pass India mart ka app nahi hota wo seedhe jaake website se post kar raha hota hai.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Haan haan haan haan.

Executive: Thik hai to jitne bhi number hai sabko aap whatsapp business hoga aapke pass.

Customer: Thik thik.

Executive: Whatsapp business sabko whatsapp sabko aap whatsapp business pe connect karna aur proper follow up karna jaise kuch din man lijiye kisi ne kaha ki mujhe rate achcha nahi laga to ho sakta hai ki panch panch 10 din baad aap usse follow up lete hain to ho sakta hai deal aapse convert kar le.

Customer: Achcha.

Executive: Thik hai to usko usko maintain karna hai aur aur koi dikkat aata hai to aap mera ek number hai aap note kar lo ek bar main bata du personal customer care ka number hai main aapko apna company number de de raha hu apna aap ek bar note kar lo.

Customer: Ji ji bataiye.

Executive: 95

Executive: Ji 9599

Executive: Hello

Executive: Sir 9599 likhiye.

Customer: Ji ji sir. Ek minute ek minute sir ek minute line par rahiye sir.

Executive: Haan haan.

Executive: 9599

Customer: 99

Executive: 66

Customer: 66

Executive: 90

Customer: 90

Executive: 93

Customer: 93 Haan aapka pata naam le mera kya abhishek naam hai abhishek ji.

Executive: Main bhi aapke bagal kahi baksar kahi bhi main hi hu lekin Noida me hum Noida me rehte hain.

Customer: Ji ji ji. Thik thik thik hai thik hai aur aapke call se na customer care me ticket open ho jata hai to main wo ticket open close kar du na agar aapko resolution mil gaya hoga aapke issues ka to.

Customer: Ji ji ji ji. Main main wo ticket band kar du?

Customer: Haan band kar dijiye sir.

Executive: Thik hai thik hai thik hai.

Executive: Thank you so much sir.

Customer: Thik hai aapko humne batawa kar diya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's call got disconnected.

- Wants to know about lead generation.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about filter option for leads.

- Explained about MDC and byit balance.

- Executive shared tips for lead conversion.

- Shared company number.

- Closed the ticket.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mdc, follow up, whatsapp business
